member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Cell._runeWidthCache
member.summary: UnicodeCalculator.GetWidth documents the width as (-1, 0, 1, 2). We only need space for these values and a sentinel for uninitialized values. This is only five values in total so we are storing one byte per value. We could store 2 per byte but that would add more logic to the retrieval. We should add one to char.MaxValue because the total number of characters includes \0 too so there are 65536 valid chars.
